description:
Serious protection for your bike. The hexagonal chain links resists bolt cutters, and the mini-U-Lock is too small to allow for prying. When you want to make sure your bike remains exactly where you left it, then this is the kind of lock you need.

  • Hexagonal and square chain links have more surface to make them very resistant to bolt cutters
  • Nylon chain cover with Velcro closures helps protect finish
  • Magnum Quattro bolt locking mechanism locks the crossbar to the shackle on 4 sides for extremely high pull resistance
name: Magnum 3006 Mini U-Lock  & Chain
